questions.question: The boxplot below shows the heights of a sample of 100 trees growing on a tree farm. Which statement is correct?

chartConfig.description: Vertical boxplot showing the heights of a sample of 100 trees growing on a tree farm

questions.explanation: The median is 36 inches, the range is 42-30=12 inches, and the IQR is 38-34=4 inches. Only options A and C are correct individually, but D states 'All of the above' which is incorrect since B is wrong.
